description:
Everyone wishes to have hairs that are skinny, shiny, and strong but it becomes a challenge sometimes to manage hair-related issue, genes do play a very crucial role in hair-related issue but it doesn't mean you can't do anything to make your hair more strong, thick and nourishing.

In this article, we'll look out for different ways you can take to strengthen your hair, increase hair growth.

details.full_description:
Many research has shown that vitamins deficiencies may be linked to hair loss, like the rest of your body your hair needs specific vitamins & minerals to be healthy & strong. Vitamins and minerals which are very important for your hair growth are Vitamin A, B, C, D, E, Iron, Zinc well it's typical to get all these essential nutrients from the food you eat.
What's more, you can take multivitamins that include all the essential vitamins and minerals your body & hair need, before taking any supplements first check with your doctor.

Keep your hair clean and dust-free but most of the shampoo use ingredients that take away your hair's natural oil, try to use shampoo which most suited your hair with time, and don't use too much shampoo, prefer to use shampoo 2-3 times in a week.

Egg yolk contains proteins and essential nutrients that have been linked to hair growth and healthy hair, including vitamin, A and D, Biotin, Folate.

Making - Use 3egg yolks and 3-4 tbsp. of warm coconut oil, mix them properly the gently apply them on your scalp and roots and wait for 10-15 minutes, then rinse it out with cool water.

There are several foods that  are rich in proteins, micronutrients & other important vitamins that prevent weak hairs, such foods are Amla, Coconut oil, Almonds, Walnuts, Buttermilk, Green gram(Moong), Raisins, Spinach, Licorice (Mulethi powder), Fenugreek seeds (Methi).

Below are the things you need to avoid in order to prevent your hair from damage :
1. Avoid too much washing of hairs
2. Avoid Heat-styling tools
3. Remove unhealthy foods from your diet
4. Dehydration
5. Avoid stress
6. not sleeping enough.

details.full_description: If you are tired of your hair fall or other issues related to your hair you can use the above tips, these practices will definitely help your hair in strengthening your hair roots.

title: Tips to strengthen your Hair Roots
